dao.name: SEL_ATTEN_NAM
dao.statement: select cust_mn_pers_dt.per_nam as atten_nam, role_rf.role_rmk, cust_mn_pers_dt.tel_nos from cust_mn_pers_dt,role_rf where cust_mn_pers_dt.role_cod = role_rf.role_cod(+)

dao.name: QRY_ATTEN_NAM
dao.statement: select cust_mn_pers_dt.per_nam as atten_nam from cust_mn_pers_dt,role_rf,member_mn where cust_mn_pers_dt.role_cod=role_rf.role_cod(+) and cust_mn_pers_dt.secretary_cod=member_mn.cust_cod(+) and trim(cust_mn_pers_dt.cust_cod) = trim(:cust_cod) and trim(cust_mn_pers_dt.seq_nos) = trim(:atten_cod)
